title: Vardy v Rooney: A Courtroom Drama
overview: Dubbed the #WagathaChristie case when it first unfolded on social media in 2019, this drama-documentary will recreate the high court defamation case that followed.  Using the real court transcripts verbatim, Vardy v Rooney: A Courtroom Drama will bring viewers all of the incredible and unbelievable moments from a case that was not allowed to be televised.
